item.title: DamFormer Paper Published in Physics of Fluids
item.description: Our latest research on dam break simulation using transformer architecture has been published in Physics of Fluids.

item.title: Rs-ModCubes Paper Accepted by IEEE RA-L
item.description: Our innovative approach to sparse-to-dense field reconstruction has been accepted by IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters.

item.title: New Patent Granted for Underwater Robotics
item.description: A new patent has been granted for our biomimetic underwater propulsion system.
